entry.title: Huawei Nexus 6P Battery
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 19.99

You have a Huawei Nexus 6P that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your Huawei Nexus 6P shuts down unexpectedly?

Does your cell phone only work when the battery is plugged in?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new Huawei Nexus 6P replacement battery.

The old battery in your cell phone can outgrow inside and damage the internals.

The OEM Batteries for Huawei Nexus 6P are brand-new batteries coming directly from our manufacturer. They are custom-built for customers who demand the same quality as original Huawei batteries. 

  • Zero cycle count
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • No wrapping for a better fit
  • High output current capacity
  • 1 Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is only compatible with a Huawei Nexus 6P.

Warranty

The Replacement Huawei Nexus 6P Battery comes with a 1-year warranty, as the other Huawei Battery Replacement Parts.

Part Type Huawei Battery
Compatible Model Huawei Nexus 6P
Battery Type Non-removable Li-Po 3450 mAh battery
Device Manufacturer Huawei
Warranty 1 Year Warranty
